articles.title: Coronation roles for Prince George, Camilla's grandchildren, says Buckingham Palace - Reuters UK
articles.description: King Charles's grandson Prince George and the grandchildren of the Queen Consort Camilla will play major roles in the coronation of the British monarch next month, Buckingham Palace confirmed on Tuesday.
